semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Aspect ratio
fields.description: Automatic means fixed aspect ratio automatically determined based on the images

fields.label: Aspect ratio width
fields.description: If you use 4 here, and 3 for the height the aspect ratio will be 4:3

fields.label: Aspect ratio height
fields.description: If you use 3 here, and 4 for the width the aspect ratio will be 4:3

fields.label: Loop
fields.description: If set, slider will progress from last image to first image and vice versa

fields.label: Automatic progression
fields.description: If set, slider will progress to next slide automatically after a configurable time period

fields.label: Progression time
fields.description: If a time period is set (in seconds), the slider will progress to the next slide automatically after that time period.

fields.label: Hide navigation
fields.description: If set, navigation will work, but items used for navigation are hidden.

fields.label: Label for next slide buttons
fields.description: This is only used for read-speakers. It won't be displayed.

fields.label: Label for previous slide buttons
fields.description: This is only used for read-speakers. It won't be displayed.

fields.label: Label for slide buttons
fields.description: This is only used for read-speakers. It won't be displayed. %slide is a variable and will be replaced with the image number.
